title: GH-169: Make apr import --output optional
approach: Derive default output path from source: hf://org/repo → repo.apr, file.gguf → file.apr
five_whys: WHY is --output required? → Original design assumed explicit output path
WHY is this a problem? → User must type extra args for common case
WHY is the common case predictable? → Output is usually source name + .apr extension
WHY not derive automatically? → No reason - simple enhancement
ROOT CAUSE: Missing convenience feature for default output path
toyota_way_principle: Kaizen - Small continuous improvement for better UX

changes: lib.rs: Make output Option<PathBuf> instead of PathBuf
import.rs: Derive output from source if not provided
